summary: Add's a follower called Claire to the BanneredMare in Whiterun
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][color=#ff0000]UPDATE: Added a copy that doesn't need the KS Hairdo 265 mod use's in game hair[/color] [color=#ff0000]for people who don't want to download it tried to keep as close as i could to the original mod as i could[/color]
Feel free to add image's if you want.[/size]

Add's a follower called Claire to the BanneredMare in Whiterun

Name:Claire
Race:Imperial
Age:19
Class:SpellSword
Spell's:Lighting Bolt FireBolt Spark's Flame's Ice Spike's
Perk's:Armsman Blademan Novice Destruction Apprentice Destruction
Starting weapon[b]:Blades Sword[/b]
Marked as essential follower's dieing get's old

Mod's used: Fair Skin Complexion DIMONIZED UNP female body UNP Texture Blender KS Hairdos - 265 XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS zzjay's wardrobe
And Enhanced Character Edit for the ear's

[font=Georgia][color=#ff0000][size=5]Required Mod's[/size][/color][/font]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body UNP [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D51602%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Fair Skin Complexion[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58221/?]KS Hairdos - 265[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53442/?]zzjay's wardrobe[/url]


[font=Georgia][color=#efefef][size=5]recommended[/size][/color][/font][color=#efefef][size=5]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]Xp32 Maxmimum Skeleton[/url] for sword on back[/size]
